title: TT-Metal Overview
description: TT-Metal is a low-level Software Development Kit (SDK) for Tenstorrent Neural Processing Units (NPUs), providing direct access to the underlying hardware. It consists of two core layers—TT-NN and TT-Metalium—and enables developers to fully harness the performance of Tenstorrent chips. As the foundation of the entire software stack, all higher-level compilers and runtimes—including TT-Forge and TT-NN—ultimately operate through TT-Metal.
